document_data.caption: ''The majestic giant eagle Stormwing''
document_data.name: Stormwing
document_data.mainbody: '''Stormwing''' was a adventurous [[giant eagle]] [[ranger]] of [[Lurue]] and an agent of the [[Fangshields]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. With a vast array of contacts and allies across the Realms, Stormwing traveled far and often to help those who requested his aid.
document_data.Description: The giant eagle had a brown cloak of feathers over most of his body, which were lighter around the head, neck and chest. He had a keen black eyes, an extremely sharp, yellow-brown beak and mighty, razor-edged talons.
document_data.Relationships:
Stormwing, third of his name, was an eagle of the [[Stormwind Aerie]]. This family of majestic eagles served as the aerial wing of the Fangshields, fighting off predators like [[wyvern]]s and rescuing allies that were caught in otherwise unreachable terrain. His ancestors that shared his name were famous heroes of [[Faer√ªn]], a heritage he was more than capable of continuing.

He had a number of friends and contacts among the rangers and [[druid]]s of the realms, especially among the [[Harpers]] and [[Emerald Enclave]]. Stormwing had even befriended a particularly progressive [[Thay]]an [[wizard]] who traveled across the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.Possessions: Stormwing wore a [[gold]]en ''[[lesser ring of invisibility]]'', which was an heirloom of his family.
